subject: Baseball
World Series
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Texas Rangers have five days to sign Cliff Lee before other teams can make free-agent bids, and they know the Yankees will be waiting. The Rangers would be wise to back away.
snippet: The Texas Rangers have five days to sign Cliff Lee before other teams can make free-agent bids, and they know the Yankees will be waiting. The Rangers would be wise to back away.
